summary: Blogs UI pages, routes, and navigation appear to be added, and frontend query hooks reference blog APIs. Backend adds a BlogPost type and storage, but the diff summary does not show the required public/admin blog API methods, so REQ-6 cannot be fully verified. Additionally, the diff summary indicates multiple unrelated UI/feature changes beyond the requested Blogs section.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes public query methods to list blog posts and fetch a single blog post by id (maintenance-gated like other public content).
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo shows the new BlogPost type, blogs map, nextBlogId, and maintenance gating helper, but the diff summary is truncated and does not show any new blog list/get query methods being implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes admin-only CRUD methods to add, update, and delete blog posts using the same admin authorization pattern as addArticle/updateArticle/deleteArticle.
missing_requirements.reason: No admin-only blog CRUD functions are visible in the provided backend/main.mo excerpt; only type/state additions are shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Blog post ids are generated on the backend monotonically increasing similar to other content types.
missing_requirements.reason: A nextBlogId variable is shown, but the diff summary does not include any create/add method that uses it, so monotonic id generation is not verifiable from the provided diff excerpt.
